parameters.name: search

parameters.name: _wt
parameters.description: to fetch all data include archived data

parameters.name: _ot
parameters.description: to fetch only archived data

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: sort data by selected attribute.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: only available with sort parameter enabled. The order value: ASC and DESC only

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: return total  data per page. Default is 10 per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: required to fetch data in specific page, optional to get the first page

parameters.name: nit
parameters.description: filter by specific NIT

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description: filter data by start date and finish date (use along with finish_date)

parameters.name: finish_date
parameters.description: filter data by start date and finish date (use along with start_date)

parameters.name: group
parameters.description: group the result by attribute

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: filter data by user name, NIT, NIP, email, test name, or test group name

parameters.name: departments
parameters.description: filter by department ID (in array)

parameters.name: units
parameters.description: filter by unit ID (in array) according to the current user role

parameters.name: positions
parameters.description: filter by position ID (in array) according to the current user role

parameters.name: positionClass
parameters.description: filter by position class (in array) according to the current user role

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: filter according to the user_id

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: filter according to the group_id

parameters.name: _wt
parameters.description: to fetch all data include archived data

parameters.name: _ot
parameters.description: to fetch only archived data

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: sort data by selected attribute.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: only available with sort parameter enabled. The order value: ASC and DESC only

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: return total  data per page. Default is 10 per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: required to fetch data in specific page, optional to get the first page

parameters.description: to fetch all data include archived data

parameters.description: to fetch only archived data

parameters.description: return total  data per page. Default is 10 per page
